image.imageCaption: I love exploring, and have seen much of Richmond over the past 2 1/2 years I've been in Richmond. I took my brother to see Belle Isle, a picturesque park on the James River.

hobbies.description: I have enjoyed Bollywood dancing for over a decade now and have performed numerous times a year in front of thousands of people!

image.imageCaption: My dance partner and I posing in a traditional move of the Indian Folk Dance, Bhangra. This performance I participated in through my college Bhangra dance team.

hobbies.activity: Spending Time with Family and Friends

image.imageCaption: My family taking a quick selfie before our Christmas party!
